channel.title: MySQL Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: MySQL Quickstart
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. MySQL QuickStart This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run a MySQL database. Note: The yaml files used in this tutorial are stored in docs/examples/mysql folder in GitHub repository kubedb/docs. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using kind.
